name: 2023 the 7th International Conference on Virtual and Augmented Reality Simulations
content: Publication: Accepted and presented papers will be published in ICVARS 2023 Conference Proceedings, which will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM, which will be archived in ACM Digital Library, and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). The ISBN number assigned to ICVARS 2023 is 978-1-4503-9747-6
